All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionParser
Class ActionParser handles players' input received as a result of clicks on GUI elements.
ActivePersonalityMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game when there's an update on a Personality card's activation
Assistant
This class represents the Assistant card Each Player has a deck of 12 assistant cards
AssistantDeckUpdateMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game when there's an update on a player's assistant deck
AvailableTowerMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game after a player has chosen its tower notifying all players about the remaining available towers
AvailableWizardMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game after a player has chosen its wizard notifying all remaining players about remaining available wizards
BanPersonality
This is a subclass of the class Personality This class represents the Personality card with CardID 4 At the beginning of the game this card has 4 bans tiles on it
Basket
This class contains the information and the methods that can be called on the game's bag.
BasketTest
 
Board
This class contains the information and the actions that can be performed on a school's Board.
BoardTest
 
BoardUpdateMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game after updates on a player's board content
Card10EffectMessage
This message is sent after the player has used personality card 10
Card11EffectMessage
This message is sent after the player has used personality card 11
Card12EffectMessage
This message is sent after the player has used personality card 12
Card1EffectMessage
This message is sent after the player has used Personality card 1
Card3EffectMessage
this message is sent after the player has used personality card 3
Card5EffectMessage
This message is sent after the player has used personality card 5
Card7EffectMessage
This message is sent after the player has used personality card 7
Card9EffectMessage
This message is sent after the player has used personality card 9
CLI
Class CLI represents the main class for the Client Command Line Interface component.
Clickable
 
ClientBoard
Class ClientBoard holds basic information about a SchoolBoard state in order to render its content through CLI and GUI interfaces.
ClientBoardTest
 
ClientCloud
Class ClientCloud holds basic information about a Cloud state in order to render its content through CLI and GUI interfaces.
ClientCloudTest
 
ClientHandler
ClientHandler's class handles the communication between a single client and the server by making use of sockets.
ClientIsland
Class ClientIsland holds basic information about an Island state in order to render its content through CLI and GUI interfaces.
ClientIslandTest
 
ClientMessageBuilder
Class ClientMessageBuilder receives generic arraylist of data and a clientState to build state-specific messages which will be sent to the server
ClientPersonality
Class ClientPersonality holds basic information about a Personality state in order to render its content through CLI and GUI interfaces.
ClientSocket
Class ClientSocket handles client communication with server It receives messages from the server and passes it to higher level classes (CLI or GUI) and sends messages received from the above-mentioned higher level classes
ClientState
Enum ClientState defines in a finite state machine way the possible states in which a client can be found.
ClientStateMessage
This message is sent from Server informing the Client on its new status
CloseTurnMessage
this message is sent when a player has finished his turn.
Cloud
This class contains the information and the actions that can be performed on a cloud tile.
CloudSelectionMessage
Thiss message is sent from Client to Server to notify the choice of cloud to be emptied to fill the lobby
CloudsRefillMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game after the update on cloud tiles' student refills
CloudTest
 
CloudUpdateMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game and notifies that a cloud has been emptied
CoinsUpdateMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game after updates of coins allocation
Color
Colors which identifies students and teachers' objects.
ConnectMenuController
Class ConnectMenuController implements all the logic behind the Connect Menu FXML Scene It parses ip and port strings from TextField, sets up buttons style,handles mouse events, and passes built message back to the GUI instance
Constants
 
CurrentTurnAssistantCardsUpdateMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game after updates on selected assistant card
DisconnectMessage
This message is sent to the Server in case of disconnection
EmptyBasketException
Class EmptyBasketException is thrown when has been emptied of all its student tiles.
EndGameException
Class EndGameException is thrown when a player voluntarily quits an existing game.
EndGameMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game at the end of the game communicating the winner's name
EndTurnMessage
 
EriantysClient
 
ErrorKind
Type of error that can be notified from Server to Client
ErrorMessage
This message is sent from Server to Client every time there's an error
ExpertGame
This is a subclass of game contains the information and the actions that can be performed in the expert game mode Each player can play 3 Personality card Each player can earn money to purchase Personality card
ExpertGameTest
 
Game
This class contains the majority of the game's elements and logic.
GameBoard
Class GameBoard holds basic information about the game state in order to render its content through CLI and GUI interfaces.
GameBoardTest
 
GameController
Class GameController receives parameters relative to game moves from GameHandler and communicates with model's Game class in order to apply those moves.
GameHandler
GameHandler's class receives messages from clients through ClientHandler class and propagates them to GameController, in order to change the model's state.
GameInstantiationMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game and carries the information about newly instantiated game elements
GameParametersMessage
This message is sent from Client to Server to notify the number of players and game mode choosen by the player
GameTableController
Class GameTableController implements all the logic behind the Game Table FXML Scene It renders almost all the game elements, handles mouse event handling, sets up various selection effects, deals with player input and sends messages back to the GUI
GameTest
 
GUI
Class GUI represents the main class for the Client Graphic Interface component.
GUIBoard
Class GUIBoard renders the board's elements on the screen For each player, a GUIBoard instance is assigned
GUICloud
Class GUICloud renders the cloud's elements on the screen For each cloud, a GUICloud instance is created
GUIController
 
GUIControllerInterface
 
GUIIsland
Class GUIIsland renders the island's elements on the screen For each island, a GUIIsland instance is created
GUILauncher
 
GUIPersonality
Class GUIPersonality renders the card image and elements on the screen For each card, a GUIPersonality instance is created
InactivePersonalityMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game after the deactivation of a Personality card
InputParser
Class InputParser handles players' input from CLI and interprets it accordingly to the Client State.
Island
This class shapes the behaviour of the game's component represented by the island tile.
IslandBanUpdateMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game after updates on an island's bans count
IslandMergeUpdateMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game after the merge of islands
IslandStudentsUpdateMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game after updates of an island's students number
IslandTest
 
IslandTowersUpdateMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game after updates of an island's towers number
LastRoundMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game notifying that current round is the last game round
Lobby
This class manages the phase between the connection of a client and the beginning of a new game.
LobbyController
Class LobbyController should contain all the logic for the Lobby Menu Scene In the current version the lobby menu doesn't require player input,but that could possibly change in a future update
LobbyPersonality
This is a subclass of the class Personality.
LoginRequestMessage
This message is sent from Client to Server to notify a login request by a player
MainMenuController
Class MainMenuController implements all the logic behind the Main Menu FXML Scene including button event handling and button styling
MatchMakingController
Class MatchMakingController implements all the logic behind the MatchMaking Menu FXML Scene It parses parameters from ChoiceBox instances, sets up buttons' styling, handles mouse events, and passes built message back to the GUI instance
Message
 
MotherNatureMovementUpdateMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game after updates about Mother Nature movements
MotherNatureMoveMessage
This message is sent from Client to Server to notify Mother Nature moves
MoveStudentsFromLobbyMessage
This message is sent from Client to Server to notify the movement of students from lobby
NicknameController
Class NicknameController implements all the logic behind the Nickname Menu FXML Scene It parses nickname string from TextField, sets up buttons style,handles mouse events, and passes built message back to the GUI instance
Personality
This class represents the Personality card.
PersonalityTest
 
PersonalityUpdateMessage
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game after updates about a personality card usage
Ping
 
PlayAssistantCardMessage
This message is sent from Client to Server to notify which assistant card the player has choosen
Player
This class contains the information of a Player.
PlayerTest
 
PlayPersonalityCardMessage
This message is sent from Client to Server to notify which Personality card the player has choosen
QuitException
Class QuitException is thrown when a client send a DisconnectMessage to server.
Server
Server class is the main class on the server side: it manages the connection's setup phase up to the game's start; it also handles the registration of clients.
ServerSocketConnection
 
Tower
Type of towers which can be chosen
TowerChoiceController
Class TowerChoiceController implements all the logic behind the Tower Choice Menu FXML Scene It sets up buttons and images styling, handles mouse events, and passes built message with tower enum back to the GUI instance This class implements UpdatableController interface which includes a few methods to implement the typical tabletop turn mechanics and the updatable interface
TowerSelectionMessage
This message is sent from Client to Server to notify which tower has been chosen by the player
UI
 
UpdatableController
 
UpdateMessage
 
UpdateMessageBuilder
Class UpdateMessageBuilder is responsible for the assembly of an UpdateMessage carrying the information about changes in the model state.
WizardChoiceController
Class WizardChoiceController implements all the logic behind the Wizard Choice Menu FXML Scene It sets up buttons and images styling, handles mouse events, and passes built message with wizard ID back to the GUI instance This class implements UpdatableController interface which includes a few methods to implement the typical tabletop turn mechanics and the updatable interface
WizardSelectionMessage
This message is sent from Client to Server to notify which wizard has been choosen by the player
